headline: Stocks to Watch Recap: Robinhood, Verizon, AT&T, AppLovin
summary: ↗️ Robinhood (HOOD): The online retail brokerage, plus AppLovin (APP), are set to join the S&P 500 on Sept. 22, the index's compiler said late Friday. Both stocks rallied Monday, with Robinhood rising 15.

headline: PNC to buy Colorado bank for $4.1 billion as part of coast-to-coast push
summary: Pittsburgh’s PNC Financial Services Group said Monday it reached an agreement to acquire Colorado lender FirstBank for $4.1 billion, moving one of the largest regional banks in the US one step closer to becoming a coast-to-coast brand.

raw.headline: PNC to buy Colorado bank for $4.1 billion as part of coast-to-coast push

headline: Stocks to Watch Monday: Robinhood, EchoStar, Tesla, AppLovin
summary: ↗️ Robinhood (HOOD): The online retail brokerage, plus AppLovin (APP), are set to join the S&P 500 on Sept. 22, the index's compiler said late Friday. Both stocks rallied Monday morning. ↗️ Nutanix (NTNX): The cloud-computing company will enter the S&P MidCap 400 at the same time.

headline: PNC Announces Agreement to Acquire FirstBank, Significantly Growing its Presence in Colorado and Arizona
summary: The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. (NYSE: PNC) today announced a definitive agreement to acquire FirstBank Holding Company, including its banking subsidiary FirstBank, headquartered in Lakewood, CO.

summary: The agreement helps Pittsburgh-based PNC gain ground in the West and cement its status as a national competitor.
